text: nivu iruva pratiyondu sannivesakke, kurâ€Œanâ€Œna yavude bhagavannu nivu odiddakke, mattu nivu nirataragiruva pratiyondu karmakke navu (allahanu) saksiyagade iruvudilla. Hageye, bhumiyallagali akasadallagali iruva, kanagatrada vastu kuda nim'ma odeyaninda mareyagiruvudilla. Matravalla, adakkintalu sannadada athava doddadada yava vastuvu ondu spastavada granthadalli dakhalagade ulidiruvudilla
